text: Calisthenics is a series of exercises used to develop strength, power and balance or a repeated rhythmical exercise that uses the weight of the body as resistance or the systematic exercises for attaining strength-gracefulness or the practice of calisthenic exercises. The name calisthenics is Greek in origin, a combination of the words 'beauty' and 'strength'. Calisthenics is recommended for general good health, light exercises designed to promote general physical fitness. ==Related pages== * Equilibrioception * Flexibility training * Jogging * Training * Weight training Category:Fitness
title: Calisthenics
